content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Stone Furnace Facility at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: 0.0, 0.0) – Smelts iron ore into iron plates.
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5) – Stores produced iron plates.

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at position (-16.0, -51.0)
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position: -16.0, -51.0) – Extracts iron ore.
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -49.5) – Transfers ore from the delivery belt.
- Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -49.5) – Delivers extracted ore.
- Iron Chest (position: -13.5, -49.5) – Stores the extracted ore.
- Intermediate Transport Belt (position: -15.5, -47.5) – Feeds ore to a remote branch.
- Burner Inserter (position: -14.5, -47.5) – Transfers ore on the intermediate belt.
- Remote Output Chest (position: -13.5, -47.5) – Receives ore from the remote inserter.

### Copper Furnace at position (-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position: -27.0, -60.0) – Smelts copper ore into copper plates.

### Lab Power Integration System at position (0.5, 2.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position: 0.5, 2.5) – Processes science packs.
- Offshore Pump (position: -7.5, 25.5) – Draws water from the resource.
- Boiler (position: 2.0, 17.5) – Converts water into steam; recent fuel insertions have been attempted but it continues to report NO_FUEL.
- Steam Engine (position: 5.5, 5.5) – Generates electricity; remains NOT_CONNECTED with fluid input warnings.
- Pipe Connections:
  • Working connection from Offshore Pump to Boiler via PipeGroup at (2.5, 21.5) (fluid_system=880, status: FULL_OUTPUT).
  • Attempted L-shaped pipeline from Boiler to Steam Engine: 13 segments were planned along coordinates from (2.5, 15.5) to (3.0, 5.5), with a resulting PipeGroup at (3.5, 7.5) (fluid_system=873, status: EMPTY) indicating unresolved placement and connection errors.

### Pipe Production Facility at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling Machine (position: 3.5, 0.5) – Configured for pipe crafting; currently shows NO_POWER and missing-resource warnings (iron-plate (1)).
- Iron Chest (position: 1.5, 0.5) – Stores crafted pipes.
- Electricity Network comprising:
  • Small Electric Poles at positions (2.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), (4.5, 3.5), (6.5, 0.5)
  • Additional poles at (5.5, 0.5), (3.5, -2.5), (3.5, -1.5)
  • Note: An attempted placement of a new pole at (4.5, 0.5) failed due to an existing obstruction.

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Pipe Crafting and Resource Errors
  - Ensure a sufficient stock of iron plates before crafting pipes; verify that smelting in the Stone Furnace is operating adequately to meet pipe production requirements.

• Pipeline Placement and Connectivity Issues
  - Confirm that target positions for pipe segments are unobstructed and within the allowed placement distance; clear or reposition any interfering objects along the planned route.
  - Check that the inventory contains the required number of pipe segments before initiating pipeline assembly.
  - For linking the Boiler to the Steam Engine, inspect fluid connection points and remove blockages to allow proper PipeGroup connections.

• Electric Pole Placement and Electrical Network Integration
  - Before placing additional electric poles, verify that the inventory is sufficient and that the chosen location is free of existing entities.
  - Ensure that network nodes are correctly aligned to support a continuous electrical network and eliminate power delivery warnings.

• General Connection and Inventory Verification
  - Regularly review both inventory counts and entity connection statuses across production and fluid networks to preempt resource shortages and spatial conflicts.
